title: definitions
description: Reusable definitions of core object types

timestamp.description: ISO-8601 (UTC) string representing date and time.

source.description: Source of data. An object containing at least the properties defined in 'properties', but can contain anything beyond that.

src.description: NMEA2000 src value or any similar value for encapsulating the original source of the data

pgn.description: NMEA2000 pgn of the source message

version.description: Version of the Signal K root object.

mmsi.description: Maritime Mobile Service Identity (MMSI). Has to be 9 digits. See http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Maritime_Mobile_Service_Identity for information.

uuid.description: UUID assigned by the implementation of the Signal K server to vessels that don't have a MMSI. Has to be 8 characters (chosen so one could use the first block in a RFC4122 UUID), to distinguish from MMSI.

stringValue.description: Data should be of type string.

timestamp.description: timestamp of the last update to this data

numberValue.description: Data should be of type number.

timestamp.description: timestamp of the last update to this data

floatValue.description: Data should be of type float/double.

timestamp.description: timestamp of the last update to this data

nullValue.description: Data should be of type NULL.

timestamp.description: timestamp of the last update to this data

alarmValue.description: The possible states of an alarm.

timestamp.description: timestamp of the last update to this data

alarmMethod.description: The methods an alarm will use to raise attention

timestamp.description: timestamp of the last update to this data

_attr.title: _attr schema.
_attr.description: Filesystem specific data, eg security, possibly more later.

_mode.title: _mode schema.
_mode.description: Unix style permissions, often written in `owner:group:other` form, `-rw-r--r--`

meta.title: Meta schema.
meta.description: Provides meta data to enable alarm and display configuration.

displayName.title: DisplayName schema.
displayName.description: A display name for this value.

shortName.title: ShortName schema.
shortName.description: A short name for this value.

warnMethod.title: WarnMethod schema.
warnMethod.description: The method to use to raise the warning.

alarmMethod.title: AlarmMethod schema.
alarmMethod.description: The method to use to raise the alarm

zones.title: Zones schema.
zones.description: The zones defining the range of values for this signalk value.

items.title: zone
items.description: A zone used to define the display and alarm state when the value is in between bottom and top.

items.title: Bottom
items.description: The lowest number in this zone
items.name: bottom

items.title: top
items.description: The highest value in this zone

items.title: alarmState
items.description: The alarm state when the value is in this zone.
items.name: alarmState
